Package org.neo4j.kernel.impl.storemigration

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    RecordStorageMigrator.SchemaStorageCreator  
    SchemaStorage  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DatabaseMigrator
    DatabaseMigrator collects all dependencies required for store migration, prepare and construct all store upgrade participants in correct order and allow clients just migrate store specified by provided location.
    DatabaseMigratorFactory  
    DirectRecordStoreMigrator
    Idea is to migrate a NeoStores store by store, record by record in a sequential fashion for quick migration from one RecordFormats to another.
    FulltextConfigExtractor
    This class is the amber in which 3.5 fulltext index config reading is preserved in.
    GenericConfigExtractor
    This class is the amber in which 3.5 generic index config reading is preserved in.
    GenericConfigExtractor.GenericConfig  
    IdGeneratorMigrator  
    IndexConfigExtractorUtil  
    IndexConfigMigrator  
    IndexProviderMigrator  
    LegacyDatabaseLayout  
    LegacyTransactionLogsLocator  
    LogsUpgrader  
    RecordStorageMigrator
    Migrates a RecordStorageEngine store from one version to another.
    RecordStorageMigrator.BatchImporterProgressMonitor  
    RecordStorageMigrator.NodeRecordChunk  
    RecordStorageMigrator.RelationshipRecordChunk  
    RecordStorageMigrator.SchemaNameGiver  
    RecordStoreVersion  
    RecordStoreVersionCheck  
    SpatialConfigExtractor
    This class is the amber in which 3.5 spatial index provider is preserved in.
    SpatialFile  
    StoreMigratorFileOperation  
    StoreScanAsInputIterator<RECORD extends AbstractBaseRecord>
    An InputIterator backed by a RecordStore, iterating over all used records.
    StoreScanChunk<T extends StorageEntityCursor>  
    StoreUpgrader
    A migration process to migrate migration participants, if there's need for it, before the database fully starts.
    VisibleMigrationProgressMonitor  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ExistingTargetStrategy
    Different options for what to do in a file operation scenario (like copy or move) where the target file already exists.
    FileOperation
    Different operations on a file, for example copy or move, given a FileSystemAbstraction and source/destination.

    MigrationStatus
